welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Laja, Chile! Known for its charming atmosphere and breathtaking natural beauty, we invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay and create unforgettable memories in Laja."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Tom Bradley International Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all international flights and is the largest terminal at the airport.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the WiFi network for free, but there is a limit on the amount of data usage.
